title: nerf riven
body:
this is riven in a nutshell

stun stun stun stun stun stun stun easy kill. and on the off chance she loses in a trade or a fight she has easy escape. 

to much cc to much damage to much mobility.

she has to have SOME sort of draw back or weakness to balance her the same way other champs do.

replies.body: You state that she has to have some kind of weakness and this shows that you clearly have no idea what you are talking about already. Her weakness is very simply it is range. I am sorry but I am sick of hearing people yell that riven is op when any player with a good amount of understanding of the game can shut her down with little to no issues.

> [{quoted}](name=Vahn65,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=R6KIp0Hh,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-01-24T19:08:03.740+0000)
>
> a biased opinion coming from someone who probably mains riven and wants her buffed. smh........

I rarely if at all ever play Riven and I think she is fairly balanced at the moment. I am just saying she is not as OP as people say. So yes my opinion may seemed a bit biased but you once again do not show that you have the know how to deal with her YET.

They best way to fight riven is dont give her kills in lane. Ask for a gank get ahead then play safe. Riven is a non factor in team fights if you starve her during laneing. If the Op plays Zed a lot like lol king says, they should not be having problems with fighting riven........

If you look at riven as what she was actually created to be

A melee attack damage carry then she seems completely fine for that.

But everyone said bruiser and a bruiser is not suppose to be a late game hyper scaling monster based on what the meta game says.

But the meta game is not health in the big scheme of things. It makes one class more valued then another and makes it much harder for telling if one kind of champion say ranged AD is too strong compared to assassins or fighters.

Sadly there is no real way to fix a Burst Fighter.... I mean yeah you "could" take off one of her CC's, but then again that'd make her a little to easy to fight... Although I don't like A stun and a Knock Up together. 

Here is my proposed fix: Rivens Q Should only Knock up if she hits you with all 3 Q's. I like the stun though its some what reliable.
remember when riven got nerfed and everyone thought she was trash now... good times
